title: The Writer's Almanac - Thursday, June 10, 2021
description: Pulitzer Prize winning novelist Saul Bellow was born on this day in 1913. “Human beings can lose their lives in libraries. They ought to be warned.”
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Pulitzer Prize winning novelist Saul Bellow was born on this day in 1913. “Human beings can lose their lives in libraries. They ought to be warned.”
